text: int main ( ) { int t ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { int n ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; long long int A [ n ] ; int i , j , count = 0 ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%lld" , & A [ i ] ) ; } for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = i ; j < n - 1 ; j ++ ) { if ( A [ j ] <= A [ j + 1 ] ) { count ++ ; } else { break ; } } } printf ( "%d\n" , count + n ) ; } return 0 ; }
